channel.title: Games on Zeppelin Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Zeppelin Studio

item.title: Schein
item.description: Use the magic of light to explore hidden worlds in the trickiest puzzle platformer you’ll play all year.

item.title: The Settlers Online
item.description: Journey to unknown lands and build your new home.

item.title: Coral Reef
item.description: Take a virtual deep dive into the stunning underwater world of corals

item.title: Rebuilders
item.description: Design your own vehicle and restore balance to the world.

item.title: Wildshade
item.description: Saddle your horse, ready your magic potions, and head to the starting line – will you become the next champion of Wildshade?

item.title: Luther
item.description: Outlaws! Help reformer Martin Luther and his fellows to survive their escape.

item.title: Crave
item.description: Gather Crystals and upgrade your gear to emerge victorious in this intense multiplayer shooter.

item.title: Data Clash
item.description: Get your rights together and fend off all the data miners!

item.title: Grattle
item.description: Help islands in distress to mend their eco-balance and hereby playfully learn the importance of renewable energy sources.

item.title: Milkshake
item.description: Do you want milk? – Shake cows!

item.title: Wizefloor
item.description: The interactive floor for education, games and more

item.title: Wake Time Frame
item.description: The live judging system for wakesurfing and more.

item.title: Minigames
item.description: Our hall-of-fame from game jams and other side-projects.
